title: Topic 002 Question 062
body: You plan to create a new data loss prevention (DLP) policy named DIP1.
DLP1 will be applied to the Exchange email location.
You need to exclude two users named User1 and User2 from DLP1.
options: Create an organization sharing policy in Microsoft Exchange.
Create a mail flow rule in Microsoft Exchange.
Create a distribution list that contains User1 and User2.
